items.sentence: I thought you said Tom would never hurt Mary.
I thought you two would have a lot in common.
Tom isn\'t the only one here who can do that.
Tom likes classical music, but Mary doesn\'t.
I don\'t know why you gave Tom so much money.
I don\'t like sitting in the back of the bus.
I don\'t like to talk about things like that.
I don\'t like you enough to want to date you.
Do you think I don\'t know what\'s happening?
Tom should\'ve done what Mary told him to do.
I\'ll mow the lawn tomorrow, unless it rains.
I\'m glad that you made it home in one piece.
I\'m taking my son to the zoo this afternoon.
I\'ve been trying to convince Tom to do that.
I debated whether to ask her about it or not.
I decided that I would quit my part-time job.
I did some work after breakfast and went out.
Our eyes take time to adjust to the darkness.
Our teacher speaks French as well as English.
People are singing and dancing in the street.
